name: Assignment 1 - Rocket Propulsion Basics
description: Complete the following problems related to basic rocket propulsion principles. Show all your work and calculations.

name: Assignment 2 - Fuel Analysis
description: Analyze different types of rocket fuels and their properties. Include efficiency calculations and recommendations.

name: Assignment 3 - Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a rocket nozzle for a specific mission profile. Include calculations, diagrams, and performance analysis.

name: Assignment 1 - Aerodynamic Analysis
description: Analyze the aerodynamic characteristics of different spacecraft configurations.

name: Assignment 2 - Flow Analysis
description: Study subsonic and supersonic flow patterns around spacecraft surfaces.

name: Assignment 3 - Thermal Analysis
description: Analyze aerodynamic heating effects and design thermal protection systems.

name: Assignment 1 - Structural Design
description: Design a spacecraft structure for a specific mission. Include material selection and stress analysis.

name: Assignment 2 - Orbital Mechanics
description: Calculate orbital parameters and plan a spacecraft mission trajectory.

name: Assignment 3 - Systems Integration
description: Integrate various spacecraft subsystems into a cohesive mission design.
